statements: DELETE FROM website_analytics WHERE user_id = 100 AND page_id = 3 AND device_type = 'Desktop';
DELETE FROM website_analytics WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM website_analytics WHERE page_id = 10 AND action_taken = 'Clicked' AND device_type = 'Mobile';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND visit_timestamp < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE visit_count > 10 AND last_visit < '2021-08-01';
DELETE FROM page_metrics WHERE total_visits > 100 AND bounce_rate < 40.00;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 10 AND page_visited = 'homepage';
DELETE FROM online_shopping WHERE user_id = 100 AND product_id = 500 AND amount > 100.00;
